courses.title: Accelerate Your Career Growth
courses.description: A comprehensive guide to navigating career transitions, making strategic moves, and building a fulfilling tech career. Learn frameworks used by senior engineers and leaders.

courses.title: Building Products That Matter
courses.description: Master the art of building products people actually want. From idea validation to launch, learn the complete process of creating successful products as a solo builder.

courses.title: AI-Powered Development Workflow
courses.description: Learn to integrate AI tools into your development workflow effectively. Boost productivity while maintaining code quality and architectural integrity.

courses.title: From Engineer to Technical Leader
courses.description: Transition smoothly from individual contributor to technical leadership. Learn the skills that matter: decision-making, team building, and technical strategy.
